code: export var isValidEmail=function isValidEmail(email){return /^\w+([\.-]?\w+)*@\w+([\.-]?\w+)*(\.\w{2,3})+$/.test(email);};export var capitalize=function capitalize(text){return text.charAt(0).toUpperCase()+text.slice(1);};export var searchText=function searchText(where,what){var regex=new RegExp(what,"i");return!!~where.search(regex);};export var toHumanReadable=function toHumanReadable(dateString){var date=new Date(dateString);var day=date.getDate()<10?'0'+date.getDate():date.getDate();var month=date.getMonth()+1<10?'0'+(date.getMonth()+1):date.getMonth()+1;var hours=date.getHours()<10?'0'+date.getHours():date.getHours();var minutes=date.getMinutes()<10?'0'+date.getMinutes():date.getMinutes();var seconds=date.getSeconds()<10?'0'+date.getSeconds():date.getSeconds();var time="".concat(hours,":").concat(minutes,":").concat(seconds);return"".concat(day,"-").concat(month,"-").concat(date.getFullYear(),"    ").concat(time);};
